EmailTemplate.subject: We want to give you time!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
It’s never too late to give your time!
Your HeadStart hours deadline has been EXTENDED to 21st February! This is your chance to catch up on your 16 hours of volunteering during February half term. Whether you’re on 0 hours or 15 hours, we want you to get involved and complete HeadStart.
WHY? Well, don't forget, if you complete 16 hours, you get the chance to interview with your chosen employer AND get a signed certificate from us which looks really good on future application forms for jobs and UCAS.
Sign up to these opportunities now before spaces go.
